alert.note: Alert for Plumas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 4:35PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR LITTLE LAST CHANCE CREEK IN PLUMAS COUNTY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very high flows along Little Last Chance Creek due to upstream dam release at Frenchman Dam and increased snowmelt. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California along Little Last Chance Creek in Plumas County. * WHEN...Until 430 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated along Little Last Chance Creek. Water is extremely cold and can quickly cause shock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 427 PM PDT, Flooding is possible along Little Last Chance Creek due to an upstream dam release and increased snowmelt. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... low lying areas around Little Last Chance Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
